channel.title: Wishlist of things for Deathmatch
channel.description:
Hello First off, I would like to say that I am currently enjoying the release of the Multiplayer. I would like to share a few suggestions on how it could be a lot cooler. Again these are ideas, feel free to agree or disagree
Spectator Mode:
* [u][b]Ability to see Avatar, Player name, Health and Ammo, and Current Weapon[/b][/u] -- The Killcam info box is a good example of knowing what the player used. That same information box could be usable in spectator mode for casters Free-For-All Deathmatch: * [u][b]1[sup]st[/sup], 2[sup]nd[/sup], and 3[sup]rd[/sup] place info on Free-For-All Deathmatch[/b][/u] -- Status on who’s first, second or third on the top left of the screen labeled as “Current Leaders” in the HEV HUD Team Deathmatch: * [u][b]See your Teammate’s status (Health, Armor, and Current Weapon)[/b][/u] -- Have the ability to see your Teammate’s status on the top left of the screen labeled “My Teammates” in the HEV HUD Server Settings: * [u][b]Allow the ability to restrict Weapons[/b][/u] -- Allow server owners to restrict what weapons can be used on the server
* [b][u]Bots for Practicing Maps[/u][/b] -- Bots for practicing new maps, weapons, or skills to try out before entering the Multiplayer experience.
This is my wish list of things I wish to be in the game. Again, if you agree, disagree, want to pelt eggs at me, reply below! :smiley: Happy Fragging – DuelRab 1310

item.title: Wishlist of things for Deathmatch
item.dc:creator: DuelRab_1310
item.description:
Hello
First off, I would like to say that I am currently enjoying the release of the Multiplayer. I would like to share a few suggestions on how it could be a lot cooler. Again these are ideas, feel free to agree or disagree

Spectator Mode:

  • Ability to see Avatar, Player name, Health and Ammo, and Current Weapon – The Killcam info box is a good example of knowing what the player used. That same information box could be usable in spectator mode for casters
    Free-For-All Deathmatch:

  • 1[sup]st[/sup], 2[sup]nd[/sup], and 3[sup]rd[/sup] place info on Free-For-All Deathmatch – Status on who’s first, second or third on the top left of the screen labeled as “Current Leaders” in the HEV HUD
    Team Deathmatch:

  • See your Teammate’s status (Health, Armor, and Current Weapon) – Have the ability to see your Teammate’s status on the top left of the screen labeled “My Teammates” in the HEV HUD
    Server Settings:

  • Allow the ability to restrict Weapons – Allow server owners to restrict what weapons can be used on the server

  • Bots for Practicing Maps – Bots for practicing new maps, weapons, or skills to try out before entering the Multiplayer experience.

This is my wish list of things I wish to be in the game. Again, if you agree, disagree, want to pelt eggs at me, reply below!
Happy Fragging – DuelRab 1310
